alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued November 03 at 8:18AM MDT until November 04 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Zion National Park including Springdale, Rockville, and Virgin. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 9 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
